name: Farm Meyham
description:
Farm Meyham

Crazy Coop game inspired by Overcooked2 and Farm Alarm (By Brackeys) where you have to work with a friend to accomplish as many deliveries as possible.

The Black Cube is where you drop the items in to deliver them. You have to plant,  use the hoe on the ground, and water to plant various vegetables. But be carful as waiting too long might result in the crops spoiling.

You get the seeds from the barrels put on the map.

---------------------

[The game's colors look washed out due to restrictions with HTML builds]

Download the game for way better graphics

[This game is a prototype so there are some bugs]

---------------------

Controls:

Player1 (red):

 WASD - Movement

E - Action Button

SpaceBar - PickUp and Drop

Player2 (blue):

Arrow Keys - movement

RightControl - Pick up / drop

Right Shift - Action

(Controller Support is Available for Player2)
